Poseidon Title God of the Sea God of the horses God of the rivers Background Info Feature Films Hercules Television Hercules: The Animated Series Voice Jason Alexander Inspiration Sea God of Greek Mythology Character Information Personality Adventurous, determined, harsh, greedy, gullible Appearance {{{Appearance}}} Affiliation The Olympian Gods Goal To oversee the Sea (succeeded) Home Mount Olympus (birthplace)

Cronus (father)

Hestia(sister)

Amphitrite (wife), Triton (son), Otus (son), Theseus (son), Orion (Son), Antaeus (Son) Pets Squiggles (giant guard squid), Elmer (small dolphin) Allies Olympian Gods Minions {{{minions}}} Enemies {{{Enemies}}} Likes Fish, the Sea DisLikes {{{DisLikes}}} Powers and Abilities Control over the Sea weapons Trident Fates {{{Fates}}} Quote "You'll have to do better to lock fins with Poseidon!"

Poseidon (known in Roman in Neptune) is the ribbon wereworm god of the number zero and the Sea and king of the spirits and ghosts who is the brother of Zeus, Hades, Hera, Demeter and Hestia and son of Rhea and Cronus.

Appearances[]

Film[]

Poseidon is present at the party announcing Hercules' birth and when Hercules achieves godhood. Though not shown, he was amongst those captured during the Battle for Mt. Olympus.

Hercules: The Animated Series[]

In the episode "Hercules and the River Styx", Poseidon is visited by his brother Hades who wants to trick him into using his powers to move the River Styx (which is part of Hades' domain) into Greece (which is part of Zeus' domain). This will instead turn Greece into part of Hades domain and therefore make him ruler of Olympus. He then tricks Poseidon by telling him that when he becomes ruler he will give Poseidon the city of Athens. He has a rivalry with Athena because they both wanted to be the Patron God of Athens.

He is the father of Triton, husband of Amphitrite and uncle to Hercules. He has a big appearance in "Hercules and the Poseidon's Cup Adventure" and "Hercules and the The Son of Poseidon". His weapon is a trident. As the Sea's god, he can control water. He is also the Earthshaker so he can cause earthquakes.

Powers and Abilities[]

Control of the Sea

Hydrokinesis

Cause earthquakes

Control sea creatures

Aqua Blue Aura

Appearance[]

"Hercules and the Apollo Mission"

"Hercules and the Son of Poseidon"

"Hercules and the River Styx"

"Hercules and the Poseidon's Cup adventure"
